```python
import pandas as pd
import requests
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup

# List of African countries involved in BRI
countries = [
    'Algeria', 'Angola', 'Benin', 'Botswana', 'Burkina Faso', 'Burundi', 'Cabo Verde', 'Cameroon',
    'Central African Republic', 'Chad', 'Comoros', 'Congo', 'Congo (Dem. Republic)', 'Côte d\'Ivoire',
    'Djibouti', 'Egypt', 'Equatorial Guinea', 'Eritrea', 'Eswatini', 'Ethiopia', 'Gabon', 'Gambia',
    'Ghana', 'Guinea', 'Guinea-Bissau', 'Kenya', 'Lesotho', 'Liberia', 'Libya', 'Madagascar', 'Malawi',
    'Mali', 'Mauritania', 'Mauritius', 'Morocco', 'Mozambique', 'Namibia', 'Niger', 'Nigeria', 'Rwanda',
    'Sao Tome and Principe', 'Senegal', 'Seychelles', 'Sierra Leone', 'Somalia', 'South Africa', 'Sudan',
    'Tanzania', 'Togo', 'Tunisia', 'Uganda', 'Zambia', 'Zimbabwe'
]

data = {'Country': [], 'Capital': [], 'Area (km²)': [], 'Population Density (per km²)': [], 'Population (in millions)': [], 'GDP from Trade (%)': []}

for country in countries:
    url = f"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/{country}"
    response = requests.get(url)
    soup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, 'html.parser')
    
    # Extracting Area
    area_elem = soup.find(string=lambda text: 'Area' in text and 'km²' in text)
    if area_elem:
        area_text = area_elem.parent.find_next_sibling(string=True).strip()
        area = int(float(area_text.replace(',', '')))
        data['Area (km²)'].append(area)
    else:
        data['Area (km²)'].append(None)
    
    # Extracting Capital
    capital_elem = soup.find(string=lambda text: 'Capital' in text)
    if capital_elem:
        capital_text = capital_elem.parent.find_next_sibling(string=True).strip()
        data['Capital'].append(capital_text)
    else:
        data['Capital'].append(None)
    
    # Extracting Population Density
    pop_density_elem = soup.find(string=lambda text: 'Population density' in text and 'people per square kilometre' in text)
    if pop_density_elem:
        pop_density_text = pop_density_elem.parent.find_next_sibling(string=True).strip()
        density = int(float(pop_density_text.replace(',', '')))
        data['Population Density (per km²)'].append(density)
    else:
        data['Population Density (per km²)'].append(None)
    
    # Extracting Population
    pop_elem = soup.find(string=lambda text: 'Population' in text and 'inhabitants' in text)
    if pop_elem:
        pop_text = pop_elem.parent.find_next_sibling(string=True).strip()
        population = int(float(pop_text.replace(',', '')) / 1000000)  # Convert to millions
        data['Population (in millions)'].append(population)
    else:
        data['Population (in millions)'].append(None)
    
    # Extracting GDP from Trade
    gdp_trade_elem = soup.find(string=lambda text: 'Exports' in text and '%' in text)
    if gdp_trade_elem:
        gdp_trade_text = gdp_trade_elem.parent.find_next_sibling(string=True).strip()
        gdp_percentage = float(gdp_trade_text.replace('%', ''))
        data['GDP from Trade (%)'].append(gdp_percentage)
    else:
        data['GDP from Trade (%)'].append(None)

df = pd.DataFrame(data)
print(df.to_markdown())
```
</python>

```python
import pandas as pd
import requests
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup

# List of African countries involved in BRI
countries = [
    'Algeria', 'Angola', 'Benin', 'Botswana', 'Burkina Faso', 'Burundi', 'Cabo Verde', 'Cameroon',
    'Central African Republic', 'Chad', 'Comoros', 'Congo', 'Congo (Dem. Republic)', 'Côte d\'Ivoire',
    'Djibouti', 'Egypt', 'Equatorial Guinea', 'Eritrea', 'Eswatini', 'Ethiopia', 'Gabon', 'Gambia',
    'Ghana', 'Guinea', 'Guinea-Bissau', 'Kenya', 'Lesotho', 'Liberia', 'Libya', 'Madagascar', 'Malawi',
    'Mali', 'Mauritania', 'Mauritius', 'Morocco', 'Mozambique', 'Namibia', 'Niger', 'Nigeria', 'Rwanda',
    'Sao Tome and Principe', 'Senegal', 'Seychelles', 'Sierra Leone', 'Somalia', 'South Africa', 'Sudan',
    'Tanzania', 'Togo', 'Tunisia', 'Uganda', 'Zambia', 'Zimbabwe'
]

data = {'Country': [], 'Capital': [], 'Area (km²)': [], 'Population Density (per km²)': [], 'Population (in millions)': [], 'GDP from Trade (%)': []}

for country in countries:
    url = f"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/{country}"
    response = requests.get(url)
    soup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, 'html.parser')
    
    # Extracting Area
    area_elem = soup.find(string=lambda text: 'Area' in text and 'km²' in text)
    if area_elem:
        area_text = area_elem.parent.find_next_sibling(string=True).strip()
        area = int(float(area_text.replace(',', '')))
        data['Area (km²)'].append(area)
    else:
        data['Area (km²)'].append(None)
    
    # Extracting Capital
    capital_elem = soup.find(string=lambda text: 'Capital' in text)
    if capital_elem:
        capital_text = capital_elem.parent.find_next_sibling(string=True).strip()
        data['Capital'].append(capital_text)
    else:
        data['Capital'].append(None)
    
    # Extracting Population Density
    pop_density_elem = soup.find(string=lambda text: 'Population density' in text and 'people per square kilometre' in text)
    if pop_density_elem:
        pop_density_text = pop_density_elem.parent.find_next_sibling(string=True).strip()
        density = int(float(pop_density_text.replace(',', '')))
        data['Population Density (per km²)'].append(density)
    else:
        data['Population Density (per km²)'].append(None)
    
    # Extracting Population
    pop_elem = soup.find(string=lambda text: 'Population' in text and 'inhabitants' in text)
    if pop_elem:
        pop_text = pop_elem.parent.find_next_sibling(string=True).strip()
        population = int(float(pop_text.replace(',', '')) / 1000000)  # Convert to millions
        data['Population (in millions)'].append(population)
    else:
        data['Population (in millions)'].append(None)
    
    # Extracting GDP from Trade
    gdp_trade_elem = soup.find(string=lambda text: 'Exports' in text and '%' in text)
    if gdp_trade_elem:
        gdp_trade_text = gdp_trade_elem.parent.find_next_sibling(string=True).strip()
        gdp_percentage = float(gdp_trade_text.replace('%', ''))
        data['GDP from Trade (%)'].append(gdp_percentage)
    else:
        data['GDP from Trade (%)'].append(None)

df = pd.DataFrame(data)
print(df.to_markdown())
```
</python>
